long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Keyword Density Calculator": Your indispensable tool for optimizing content and enhancing search engine visibility. This Chrome extension is meticulously crafted to provide you with precise insights into keyword usage within your articles, empowering you to refine your content strategy and attract organic traffic to your website.

Unlock the power of precision analysis: With its advanced algorithm, Keyword Density Calculator offers a comprehensive analysis of keyword density in articles. Say goodbye to guesswork as you gain valuable insights into keyword usage, allowing you to fine-tune content for maximum impact and relevance.

Seamless integration for effortless optimization: Seamlessly integrated into your Chrome browser, Keyword Density Calculator operates with unrivaled efficiency. With just a click, you can access its powerful features, streamlining your content optimization process and saving valuable time.

Comprehensive reporting for informed decisions: Dive deep into the metrics that matter most to your SEO strategy. Keyword Density Calculator provides detailed reports on keyword frequency, density, and prominence, empowering you to make data-driven decisions that drive results.

Customizable to suit your needs: Keyword Density Calculator offers unparalleled flexibility, allowing you to customize its settings and reports to align with your specific goals and objectives. Whether you're a seasoned SEO professional or a novice content creator, this extension adapts to your unique needs, ensuring a tailored experience that delivers results.

Stay ahead of the curve with real-time updates: In the ever-evolving landscape of SEO, staying informed is essential. With Keyword Density Calculator's real-time updates, you'll always be up-to-date on the latest trends and changes in keyword optimization, enabling you to adapt your strategy accordingly and maintain a competitive edge.

New Features:

View Total Words: Instantly calculate and display the total number of words in article with just a click. This feature provides a quick overview of content length, helping you maintain optimal article size for SEO and readability.

View Headlines: Easily extract and display all the headlines (H1 to H6) in article. .
